Name: Saiyan
Description:
## Description

Saiyans are very similar in appearance to Human-type Earthlings if you don’t account for their monkey-like tails.

## Class

Roll **1d100**.

[0-50] **Low Class Saiyan**: Training is much more beneficial to you. Instead of rolling **1d10** for training, roll **1d15**. Gain **30%** more stats (rounded down) from potential unlock. Zenkai now only required to be less than **20%** of your health.

[51-80] **Elite Class Saiyan**: Gain 1 extra **d40** roll when rolling for your stats.

[80-100] **Royal Class Saiyan**: Instead of rolling **5d20**, roll **5 d40+7** for your stats. When lower than **50%** of your Max HP, add **+4** to your rolls.

## Racial Abilities

**Zenkai**: When a saiyan recovers from a near death situation, they will gain a power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than **10%** of your health. When you recover, you will gain **PL** x (**1d15/100**) stat points rounded up.

**Intense Anger**: When under intense stress (Planet blowing up, someone important to the story dying, last stand), add **25%** of your base stats to your stats and roll **1d50**. If the roll critically succeeds, you unlock your next super saiyan transformation.

**Long Tail:** Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage against you.

Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d15: 13
500 x (13/100)
500 x .13 = 65
Stat Points Gained: 65

Name: Half-Saiyan
Description:
Half-Saiyans are generally identical to Saiyans in appearance, but sometimes they do not have tails. Under intense stress, they exhibit their human side of rising to the challenge.

**– Abilities –**

**To Tail or to Not**: Roll 1d2 to decide if you grow a tail.
1 = No Tail
2 = Tail

**Zenkai**: When a saiyan recovers from a near death situation, they will gain a power boost. For this to activate, you must survive a battle with less than **10%** of your health. When you recover, you will gain PL x (**1d10/100**) stat points rounded up.

**Intense Anger**: When under intense stress (Planet blowing up, someone important to the story dying, last stand), add **50%** of your stats to your stats and roll **1d40**. If the roll critically succeeds, you unlock your next super saiyan transformation.

**Adept in Ki**: Half-Saiyans have a good understanding of their Ki and will regenerate (**d2+WIL modifier/2**) Ki every round.

Zenkai Ex:
Power Level: 500
Roll 1d10: 8
500 x (8/100)
500 x .08 = 40
Stat Points Gained: 40

Name: Earthling
Description:
This constitutes every living being that lives on the Planet Earth. Regardless of their looks or type, they mainly have certain abilities in common.

**– Abilities –**

**Masters of Ki**: Earthlings have a strong understanding of their Ki and will regenerate (**4+WIL modifier**) Ki every round.

**Item User**: Earthlings are skilled at using items to get by. Consumable items are **100%** (rounded down) more beneficial to Earthlings.

**Intelligent**: Earthlings are a little bit more intelligent than most races. Roll **1d10+1** when rolling for initial intelligence.

**Highly Adaptable**: Earthlings are very adaptable to situations, making them very hard to get rid of completely. Earthlings have advantage on saving throws.

**Adept Potential**: Earthlings have much more potential for greatness than other races. Roll **2d60+50** for potential unlock rolls instead.

Name: Frost Demon
Description:
Frost Demons are bipedal humanoids that have red eyes and white keratinous plating covering scaly reptilian skin. They also have other reptilian features such as horns, long tails, three-toed feet, and spikes. Frost Demon’s keratinous plates can sometimes resemble gems.

**– Abilities –**

**Space Breathing**: Frost Demons have the ability to survive in the vacuum of space.

**Suppression Forms**: Frost Demons can suppress themselves into weaker forms to allow themselves to have a slight advantage in battles with weaker opponents.

**Race of Rulers**: Frost Demons are born incredibly strong. Roll **5 d80+10** for your stat rolls instead of **5d20**.

**Extraterrestrial Equilibrium:** Automatically gain the **flight** ability.

**Alien**: You spawn in the on the Frieza Planet.

**Long Tail:** Grapple attempts no longer have disadvantage against you.

Name: Namekian
Description:
Namekians are humanoids with slug-like characteristics, including antennae, light green skin, and pink patches (pale yellow in the original manga) appearing throughout their bodies. They also lack eyebrows. Elderly Namekians have darker green skin and less prominent pink patches (these appear to become dull-orange as the Namekian advances in age), pointy ears, and red rings, in which they have three red conjoined rings on their ankles and wrists, making them look like they have ankle bands and wristbands.

**– Abilities –**

**Namekian**: Namekians live on **Namek**… yeah.

**Regeneration**: Namekians have the natural ability to regenerate. Gain the ability [https://trello.com/c/90M1BpOR/139-regeneration](https://trello.com/c/90M1BpOR/139-regeneration "smartCard-inline").

**Flexible**: Namekians have extremely stretchy and flexible limbs. Spend **8** ki to gain **+4** mod to grapple attempts.

**Namekian Fusion**: Namekian warriors would often combine their powers to take out strong threats. Gain ability to fuse with one other Namekian player/NPC. Doing this will make both become one, becoming a [https://trello.com/c/iH4DF06J/104-super-namekian](https://trello.com/c/iH4DF06J/104-super-namekian "smartCard-inline"). In order to fuse with a Namekian that is not a player with no relationship, roll **1d25**. If you have a positive relationship with that Namekian, roll **1d20**. If you have a positive relationship with that Namekian and a mutual goal (i.e beating a threat to Namek), roll **1d10**. Must **critically succeed**.

**Rebirth**: Namekians have a strange way of reproducing, but it works. Lay an egg. When dying, instead of passing into the otherworld, be reborn from this egg, regaining **100%+1d20%** of previous stats on top of rolling for stats as normal. This can only be done once every **5** sagas. If this egg is destroyed or broken in some way, you cannot be reborn.

**Large Ears**: Namekians have large ears for greater hearing. Sense people up to **10** areas away with just hearing alone. Loud noises can disorient and irritate, causing **-7 DEX** mod. Alternatively, ripping off the ears can prevent this.

**Clan**: Namekians have roles in their society. Roll **1d2** to choose between Demon Clan or Dragon Clan. **1** = Demon, **2** = Dragon

- **Demon Clan**: Trained for killing and combat, you are a lot more adept at fighting than other lifeforms. Gain **+2 DEX** mod, **+3 WIL** mod, and **+3 STR** mod. Roll **5d40+10** for stats instead.
- **Dragon Clan**: The peacekeepers of the Namekian race. Gain the abilities [https://trello.com/c/P3HyvaKH/135-create-dragon-ball](https://trello.com/c/P3HyvaKH/135-create-dragon-ball "smartCard-inline") and [https://trello.com/c/nYwik5I2/140-magic-materialization](https://trello.com/c/nYwik5I2/140-magic-materialization "smartCard-inline"). Roll **1d10+2** for **INT** and gain **+5 WIL** mod and **+5 SPI** mod.

Name: Cerealian
Description:
Cerealians are anthropomorphic aliens that look very similar to Human-type earthlings, only really differing by their green hair and right eye. Over time, Cerealians' right eye evolved into a merged iris and pupil, red in color, that grants them incredible visual acuity.

**– Abilities –**

**Evolved Right Eye**: As a result of their right eye adapting over time, Cerealians are very capable snipers. When using a **Ki** attack, a Cerealian is able to **reroll their attack** chance through the use of more **Ki** this skill takes **7** Energy and can only be used **once** per attack.

**Exception Perception**: With your eye, you can easily identify patterns in an opponent’s fighting style. Every **5** turns while fighting the same opponent, roll **1d5**. If the roll is **5**, add **-1d3** **DEX** mod to their attacks for the rest of the combat.

**Vital Strike:** Through inflicting damage on the opponents weak spots, you drain their Energy. This move will roll whichever combat dice you normally use and uses **4 Energy** for Cerelians (it is learnable for other races but will double the drain to use) and it will drain **10 Energy** to whoever takes this hit. For Cerealians specifically, when critically succeeding, they land a critical hit, and deal 50% more damage

Name: Konatsian
Description:
Konatsians are known for their humanoid appearance, typically resembling Earthlings in stature and physical features. They possess varying skin tones, ranging from various shades of human-like colors, with some having slightly altered features like elongated ears or distinct facial structures.

**– Abilities –**

**Hero’s Flute**: You pull out a flute and play it. Roll a **d20**. If the roll is higher than **15**, remove all mental status effects including **Blind Rage**.

**Sword Proficiency**: Your race was known around the universe as valiant swordsmen. You know how to handle a sword very well. Add **+2 STR** mod to attacks done with swords and **-4** to all dexterity hinderances from using a weapon.
(THESE EFFECTS STACK WITH SWORDSMAN FIGHTING STYLE)

**Feinting Strike**: After critically succeeding a damage roll with a sword, your next attack roll will have advantage.

Name: Tuffle
Description:
Physically, Tuffles are small in stature compared to Saiyans, with round heads, large brains, and diminutive bodies. They have unique features such as large, expressive eyes and distinct facial structures, often portrayed with different skin tones ranging from various shades of blue, purple, or green. They are highly skilled in advanced machinery, genetics, and engineering, which allowed them to create sophisticated gadgets, advanced weaponry, and groundbreaking inventions.

**– Abilities –**

**Incredibly Intelligent**: Tuffles can easily make advanced technology as well as understand it. Roll **1d12+3** when rolling for your initial intelligence.

**Physically Frail**: Tuffles are not exactly built for combat. -**2 STR** mod and -**2 CON** mod when in combat.

**Advances in Bioengineering**: Due to your advanced intellect, you are extremely proficient in the studies of bioengineering. When making **Androids**, roll **5 8d100+120+(creators INT mod*10)** instead. You can also make [https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle](https://trello.com/c/CfWExemf/48-baby-tuffle "smartCard-inline").

Name: Oni
Description:
Onis typically have muscular builds, with horns protruding from their heads, sharp claws, and sometimes various skin tones ranging from dark shades of red, blue, or even green. Their eyes often exhibit a distinct color or glow, adding to their intimidating presence. Onis are commonly depicted with facial features that accentuate their demon-like nature, including sharp fangs and pointed ears.

**– Abilities –**

**Extreme Strength**: Onis are abnormally strong, but they are really bulky. Add +**5** **STR** mod, but -**3** **DEX** mod.

**Durable**: Add +**5** to your **CON** mod.

**Enhanced Pump Up**: Your body is a lot stronger than most races. [https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up](https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up "smartCard-inline") is a lot more effective for you.

Name: Hera
Description:
Heras typically possess distinct features that set them apart from other races. They often have a humanoid appearance with varying teal skin tones and orange hair. Additionally, some members may exhibit unique physical traits like elongated limbs, giving them an imposing and menacing presence.

**– Abilities –**

**Enhanced Physicals**: You are physically adept and have great control over your strong body. Add +**3** to **STR** mod and +**3** to **DEX** mod. Instead of rolling **5d20**, roll **5d20+20** for your stats.

**Treasure Hunters**: You spent most of your time looting and finding treasure. When failing a **search**, you will always find an item. Roll **1d100+10** instead of **1d100**. (Legendary rolls are unaffected by this passive.)

**Enhanced Pump Up**: Your body is a lot stronger than most races. [https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up](https://trello.com/c/lABmjHs2/99-pump-up "smartCard-inline")  is a lot more effective for you.

Name: Tortless Way
Description:
The Tortles are a wise race of humanoid turtles, known for their deep connection to nature, profound wisdom, and remarkable defensive capabilities. With a strong sense of community, they strive to create peace and prosperity within their own and other communities. These creatures are seen as good fortune to those who cross paths with them and are welcomed with open arms in to most communities, only frowned upon by creatures with evil and nefarious intentions.

– Abilities –

**Master of Defense**: Being a giant turtle has its pros and cons, With your shell you have a **+10 CON** mod with downside of **-5+15% DEX** mod.

**Heavy Shed**: Every week you shed your shell giving a **+10 DEX** mod, at the same time you lose **-5+15% CON** mod. Shell regenerates **4** days after the shed.

**Way of Oogway**: Descendants of the Tortle Master Oogway, you gain a **+2** in **SPI**, **WIL**, and a minimum of **4** INT as you are a sentient turtle. On top of this you are naturally seen as a symbol of good luck and peacefulness, gain an extra **+1** Alignment from all positive tasks

**Shell Rest**: While you have your shell, you have the option to hide in your shell for **+5** modifier to short rests. However, you cannot use healing pods because of your shell.

**Ancient** **Martial Weapon Proficiency:** As Descendants of the Ancient Master Oogway the tortles have a spiritual and physical connection with martial weapons. **-1d3 dex hinderance on Martial weapons** (I.e Katana , Nodachi , Sai , Nun-Chucks, Bo-Staff, Spear , and Power pole)

**Decedents of Way**: Holding saint Oogway to the highest regard all Torless must have, “Way”, in there name.

Name: Alien
Description:
Aliens are anything that isn’t specifically listed.

**– Abilities –**

1-3 Custom Abilities. **(MUST BE APPROVED)**

Name: Android
Description:
Androids are mechanical versions of their specified races. Currently, the only known races to be converted are **Cerealian**, **Earthling**, and **Tuffle**. When being converted into an android, reset your stats and roll **5 8d100+(creators INT mod*3)** for your stats and roll **1d15+5** for your intelligence.
Requires **50000** resources to make an Android.

**– Abilities –**

**Nuclear Battery**: Your ki is replaced by charge. Your **SPI** now dictates your potential max charge. Starts at **50%** of the potential max charge. Must be upgraded to be able to use more potential max charge. After combat, your battery is filled back to full. Doing an action that usually takes ki takes charge now. Unlike organics, you cannot regenerate charge in combat.

**Infinite Stamina**: You will never be fatigued by your energy.

**Flesh is Weak**: You cannot eat, sleep, or train. You can make mechanical clones of yourself. When dying, upload your consciousness to a mechanical clone (if you have one). Every facet of yourself can be upgraded through cybernetic enhancements. If you were injured, you must fix the injury through a repair table.
